item.name: Apache: Bytes transferred per second AVG (Total/Uptime)

trigger.name: Apache: access log - favicon.ico not found
Apache: access log - too many not 200 response

dependency.name: Apache: error.log 'PHP Fatal error' detected
dependency.expression: {Template App Apache2:script.apache.1.last()}=1 and {Template App Apache2:log[/var/log/apache2/error.log,,,,skip,].count(60,"PHP Fatal error","like")}>0

trigger.expression: {Template App Apache2:script.apache.1.last()}=1 and {Template App Apache2:log[/var/log/apache2/error.log,,,,skip,].count(60,"PHP Fatal error","like")}>0
trigger.name: Apache: error.log 'PHP Fatal error' detected

trigger.expression: {Template App Apache2:script.apache.1.last()}=1 and {Template App Apache2:log[/var/log/apache2/error.log,,,,skip,].count(60,"server name does not include certificate","like")}>0
trigger.name: Apache: error log - server name does not include certificate

dependency.name: Apache: error log - server name does not include certificate
dependency.expression: {Template App Apache2:script.apache.1.last()}=1 and {Template App Apache2:log[/var/log/apache2/error.log,,,,skip,].count(60,"server name does not include certificate","like")}>0

dependency.name: Apache: Too low free connections slots

trigger.name: Apache: Too low free connections slots
